trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir en implementering av en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The provider works in a similar fashion to the Microsoft .NET Framework standard licensing model.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren fungerer på samme måte i standard lisensprotokollen Microsoft .NET Framework-modellen.

trans-unit.source: The LicFileLicenseProvider offers <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: LicFileLicenseProvider tilbyr <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method determines whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> retrieved by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> method is valid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoden fastslår om den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>hentet av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>metoden er gyldig.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from this class, you can override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method to provide your own validation logic.
trans-unit.target: Når du arver fra denne klassen, du kan overstyre den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metode for å angi din egen validering logic.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class exists to provide similar licensing functionality to COM licensing and uses text license files.
trans-unit.target: Bruker tekstfiler lisensen denne klassen finnes for å gi lignende lisensprotokollen funksjoner som COM lisensiering.

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om lisensiering [slik: lisens komponenter og kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns a key for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en nøkkel for den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: The object type to return the key.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen til å returnere nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: A confirmation that the type parameter is licensed.
trans-unit.target: En bekreftelse som den type parameteren er lisensiert.

trans-unit.source: Returns a license for the instance of the component, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en lisens for forekomsten av komponenten hvis det er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: At design time, the GetLicense method looks for a license file named `myClassName.LIC`, where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component to create.
trans-unit.target: Under utformingen metoden GetLicense ser etter en lisensfil navnet `myClassName.LIC`, der `myClassName` er den <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>av komponenten til å opprette.</xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This file must be in the same directory as the .dll file that contains the component.
trans-unit.target: Denne filen må være i samme mappe som DLL-fil som inneholder komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Next, this method checks the first line of the license file against a key specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Neste denne metoden kontrollerer den første linjen i lisensfilen mot en nøkkel som er angitt i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the key is valid, this line is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nøkkelen er gyldig, brukes denne linjen som <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies where you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> som angir hvor du kan bruke lisensierte objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the component requesting the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponent ber om den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object that requests the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som ber om den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> should be thrown when a component cannot be granted a license; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> skal bli utløst når en komponent ikke kan få en lisens; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find a valid or a valid context parameter, it returns .
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden ikke finner en gyldig eller en gyldig context parameteren returneres .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the key that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*> method retrieves is valid for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om nøkkelen som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*>metoden henter er gyldig for den angitte typen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*>

trans-unit.source: This method checks the key against the phrase: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component you want to create.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kontrollerer nøkkelen mot uttrykket: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", der `myClassName` er den <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>av komponenten du vil opprette.</xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>å kontrollere.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the component requesting the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponent ber om den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*> for the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen er en gyldig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>for den angitte typen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>
